message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its unique value proposition, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,300,000. I'm open to discussing this further and exploring possibilities that benefit both of us.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value proposition.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value.  To be fair to both of us, I can come down to $2,000,000. This is significantly less than my initial asking price and reflects my willingness to negotiate.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $2,000,000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1,600,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.
